Method Detail

unpackArgs

public static java.lang.Object unpackArgs(java.lang.String[] in)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
The unpackArgs method is used to get the passed in object The caller must cats the object to the original type uppon reciept. The method does check the valid object type
Parameters:
in - array from the argument pass.
Returns:
the unpacked arguement as object
Throws:
ClassCastException - is thrown if the type doesn not match the internal type

packArgs

public static java.lang.String[] packArgs(java.lang.Object in)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Pack the the argument into a string array, with the type being the String[0]\ and the object being String[1]
Parameters:
in - Object to pack
Returns:
Packed string array

invoke

public static int invoke(Context context,
                         java.lang.String jpoName,
                         java.lang.String[] construct,
                         java.lang.String methodName,
                         java.lang.String[] params)
                  throws MatrixException
Invoke method invokes the JPO in eMatrix Kernel, returning an status
Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Class Context
jpoName - the JPO name
construct - the arguments to pass to the constructor
methodName - The methodName to call, MatrixMain if null
params - The arguements to pass to the method

invoke

public static java.lang.Object invoke(Context context,
                                      java.lang.String jpoName,
                                      java.lang.String[] construct,
                                      java.lang.String methodName,
                                      java.lang.String[] params,
                                      java.lang.Class cls)
                               throws MatrixException
Invoke method invokes the JPO in eMatrix Kernel, returning an Object. If the method fails Exception is thrown
Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Class Context
jpoName - the JPO name
construct - the arguments to pass to the constructor
methodName - The methodName to call, MatrixMain if null
params - The arguements to pass to the method
cls - The return class type
